text:
SIGN IN

to get more from

Get more than ever out of your MAKEUP.com. Save your favorite articles for quick access to the expert tips and tricks that speak to you – and the products you need to get the looks!

Select your favorite social network to get started.

This sign-up is for US consumers. By registering, you understand and agree that your data will be collected and used subject to our US privacy policy and terms of use

When you use Facebook to login to our site, be advised that your data is governed by Facebook’s privacy policies and terms of use. You can always clear your Facebook history here
title: 11 Questions for the Unstoppable Lea Michele .Makeup.com

meta_data.description: The "Glee" actress recently became the new face of L'Oréal Paris. We caught up with her on the phone and learned more about her take on her own beauty, growing up in the entertainment business, her makeup must-haves and what her new gig means to her.
